properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 11 at 11:47AM CST until January 15 at 2:46PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood
Advisory for the Tombigbee River...

Tombigbee River near Fulton affecting Itawamba County

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
the Tombigbee River near Fulton
* from Saturday January 11 until Wednesday January 15.
* At 10 AM Saturday the stage was 13.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise to near 17.2 feet Monday January 13
leveling off then slow fall.
* At 16.0 feet...Flooding of low-lying areas between the river
channels is occurring.
properties.instruction:
The next River Statement will be issued Sunday or sooner if conditions
warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
